requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 1600
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A slower CPU will limit the amount of Physics vehicles
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5600x
  • Graphics: GTX 1680
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
